name: Jira Dark (improved)
description:
Forked from https://userstyles.org/styles/101190/jira-dark

Still a work in progress, but more complete than my starting point. Edit the domain rule to match your own Jira instance.
additional_info:
Changes
-------

2016-03-15 : Style fixes (many thanks, shenjoku!)
2015-04-16 : Darken hover over editable fields
2015-03-27 : Initial upload with improvements from source (forked from https://userstyles.org/styles/101190/jira-dark)

discussions.name: On Jira 7.4.3 several elements are still white
